summary: STEERING WHEEL LOCK INDICATOR RENDERS THE VEHICLE NOT ABLE TO START.  BMW SAYS THE ONLY SOLUTION IS A REPLACEMENT OF STEERING COLUMN. THE STEERING COLUMN WAS REPLACED AT 25000 MILES. 2 YEARS LATER AT 49000 MILES, THE VEHICLE WILL NEED TO DO IT AGAIN. THIS WILL BE THE  3RD SET OF STEERING COLUMN WITHIN THE LAST 7 YEARS.  IT IS CLEANLY A DESIGN AND DEFECT. IT SHOULD BE RECALL.    *TR
